column1: #Text=" Mako says : " Bolin and I will investigate the Misty Palms Oasis , and see if he 's hold up there .
#Text=I love it when you talk like a cop .
#Text=You and Asami wait here in case he comes back .
#Text=Besides , we do n't want to call too much attention to ourselves .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Ooh , Mako , Mako , Mako !
#Text=We should wear disguises and pretend we 're going undercover !
#Text=That way , no one will recognize us .
